title: JST, Exodus 4
content: that the Lord appeared unto him as he was in
The Lord was angry with Moses, and his hand was about to fall upon him,
for he had not circumcised his son.
Then Zipporah took a sharp stone and
at his feet, and said, Surely
And the Lord spared Moses and
because Zipporah, his wife, circumcised the child. And
she said, Thou art a bloody husband.
And Moses was ashamed, and hid his face from the Lord, and said, I have sinned before the Lord.
And the Lord said unto Aaron, Go into the wilderness to meet Moses, and he went and met him, in the mount of God;
in the mount where God appeared unto him;
